message.body: Hi. No problem. I'll swing by today and bring it to you. What's your last name?
(1/2) Are you going to be in the uptown area this afternoon by any chance?<:)> i work at the tea garden today from 2 till 8. Is there anyway you could swing by
(2/2) sometime today to pick up the check? If not it'll have to wait till after 8 tonight. Is that ok?
Tonight is totally fine. Thanks, Hannah.
